description.en: After all, it was here.The boy's kingdom! Jun Hatanaka (manga artist) Synopsis Yuichi Nango, the captain of the baseball club, is known for being good at sports andends up serving as the captain of the fist fighting and judo clubs...?(From Episode 1, Captain Kakemochi)CommentaryHisashi Sekiya's masterpiece Speaking of which,the work "Stop! Nii-chan'' has been serialized in Kobunsha's magazine "Shonen'' since 1962.In the same magazine, the work was on par with Osamu Tezuka's "Astro Boy'' and Mitsuteru Yokoyama's "Gigantor'', and along with " Fight the 9th Shogakukan Manga. This is an award-winning work.In this work, Yuichi Nango, the "Superman of the 5th grade'', plays the main role, along with his strong-willed younger brother Kenji, his nemesis Sachiko who lives next door, and the Nango family's pet dog Boss, perform comic-like home dramas and school dramas. I'll give it to you.It also includes elements of the author's specialty, racing manga and sports manga, including baseball, making it a must-see work for Sekiya fans! This time,all episodes published in ``Shonen'' are recorded in order.I am delighted to be able to present this masterpiece to my fans.
